title: Dense runestone

properties.name: description
properties.value: Dense runestone is found in the dense essence mine east of the Dark Altar in Arceuus. Here, with a pickaxe and chisel, players mine the runestone to get dense essence blocks, which can be used on the dark altar at 100% Arceuus favour to runecraft blood and soul runes. Players need both level 38 Mining and level 38 Crafting in order to mine the dense runestone, and having a high Mining level will cause the runestone to deplete slower:[1] at level 1 Mining, the runestone lasts for about 5.56 blocks on average, whereas at level 99 it lasts for 10.

content:
Dense runestone
Released7 January 2016 (Update)
MembersYes
QuestNo
LocationDense runestone mine east of Dark Altar
OptionsChip
ExamineThe magical pressures of this place have warped the runestone into an incredibly dense material.
Map
Advanced data
Object ID8975

Dense runestone is found in the dense essence mine east of the Dark Altar in Arceuus. Here, with a pickaxe and chisel, players mine the runestone to get dense essence blocks, which can be used on the dark altar at 100% Arceuus favour to runecraft blood and soul runes. Players need both level 38 Mining and level 38 Crafting in order to mine the dense runestone, and having a high Mining level will cause the runestone to deplete slower:[1] at level 1 Mining, the runestone lasts for about 5.56 blocks on average, whereas at level 99 it lasts for 10.

After completion of the medium tasks in the Kourend & Kebos Diary, players have a chance to mine two dense essence blocks at once. No additional experience is awarded for the extra block.

Mine locations[edit | edit source]

LocationRocksMembers
Dense essence mine2

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • Each player has a unique instance of dense runestone. This means that players can share a location without affecting each others' depletion rate.

References[edit | edit source]

  1. ↑ Jagex. Mod Ash's Twitter account. 12 March 2018. (Archived from the original on 25 May 2020.) Mod Ash: "82% -> 90% from 1 to 99 - I suggest just going for it now."

'''Dense runestone''' is found in the [[dense essence mine]] east of the [[Dark Altar]] in [[Arceuus]]. Here, with a [[pickaxe]] and [[chisel]], players mine the runestone to get [[dense essence block]]s, which can be used on the dark altar at 100% [[Arceuus]] [[favour]] to [[runecraft]] [[Blood rune|blood]] and [[soul rune]]s. Players need both level 38 [[Mining]] and level 38 [[Crafting]] in order to mine the dense runestone, and having a high Mining level will cause the runestone to deplete slower:{{CiteTwitter|author=Mod Ash|url=https://twitter.com/JagexAsh/status/1057703180816080896|date=12 March 2018|archiveurl=https://archive.is/XJc0g|archivedate=25 May 2020|quote=82% -> 90% from 1 to 99 - I suggest just going for it now.}} at level 1 Mining, the runestone lasts for about 5.56 blocks on average, whereas at level 99 it lasts for 10.

After completion of the medium tasks in the [[Kourend & Kebos Diary]], players have a chance to mine two dense essence blocks at once. No additional experience is awarded for the extra block.

==Mine locations==
{{Mine locations|dense essence}}

==Trivia==
*Each player has a unique instance of dense runestone. This means that players can share a location without affecting each others' depletion rate.
